subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Mike Jirschele, the Royals’ third-base coach, waved Lorenzo Cain home on a risky but calculated move on Friday that resulted in the winning run in Game 6.
snippet: Mike Jirschele, the Royals’ third-base coach, waved Lorenzo Cain home on a risky but calculated move on Friday that resulted in the winning run in Game 6.
